name: pao
description:
This is a parkour game that needs to avoid obstacles!

1. Fashionable screen design

The beautiful and exquisite 2d design of the game screen allows you to indulge in the charming game world and experience various mysterious and diverse landscapes.

2. Convenient operation

Collect rhythm and avoid obstacles by moving left and right and jumping. The game design is simple and easy to operate. Enjoy the endless charm.

Game features:

Easy to use

Simple game style collides with intense parkour sports to create wonderful sparks

The game is simple to operate and easy to use. It is suitable for players of most ages to play
